alert.note: Alert for Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gray County through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lefors, or 14 miles southeast of Pampa, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lefors. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
